about.title: About Avi Ben-David
about.description: With over 15 years of experience in home appliance repair and general handyman services, I've been helping residents of Givatayim and surrounding areas keep their homes running smoothly. I believe in honest pricing, quality workmanship, and building lasting relationships with my clients. Whether it's a broken washing machine, a leaky faucet, or any other home repair need, you can count on me to get the job done right the first time.
